title: Young Voices
text:
The purpose of this research is to understand how children aged 10-12 navigate their social world; understand cultural, economic, and political issues; and how their parents help them throughout this learning process.
To answer these questions, our project team devised survey and interview instruments to learn the experiences of children and their parents.

title: Young Voices
text:
If you would like to contact our team, you can send us an email at youngvoices@duke.edu.
Alternatively, you can send your message using the form below.

title: Young Voices
text:
Welcome!
This is the official webpage of the Young Voices: Growing Up in America project at Duke University.
See our About page for project details and Project Team for project members..

title: Team Members
text: Christopher Johnston is a Professor of Political Science at Duke University. His research examines the motivational underpinnings of political judgment and decision making.

title: Team Members
text: Christopher Johnston is a Professor of Political Science at Duke University. His research examines the motivational underpinnings of political judgment and decision making.

title: Young Voices
text:
The purpose of this research is to understand how children navigate their social world, understand cultural, economic, and political issues, and parents’ socialization practices.
If you would like to contact our team, you can send us an email at youngvoices@duke.edu.
